alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued October 11 at 5:19PM MDT until October 12 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Possible in Northwest Kansas Thursday Afternoon... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 003, 004, 014, 015, 016, 027, 028, 029, 041, 042, AND 254... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 003 Decatur, 004 Norton, 014 Thomas, 015 Sheridan, 016 Graham, 027 Wallace, 028 Logan, 029 Gove, 041 Greeley, 042 Wichita and 254 Cheyenne. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 to 20 percent.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. If critical fire weather conditions appear imminent, a Red Flag Warning will be issued.
